verses.verse: After <WG3326> this <WG5023> I looked, <WG1492> and, behold, <WG2400> a door <WG2374> was opened <WG455> in heaven: <WG3772> and the first <WG4413> voice <WG5456> which <WG3739> I heard <WG191> was as it were of a trumpet <WG4536> talking <WG2980> with me; which said, <WG3004> Come <WG305> up here, <WG5602> and I will show <WG1166> you things which <WG3739> must <WG1163> be hereafter. <WG3326> <WG5023>
And immediately <WG2112> I was in the spirit: <WG4151> and, behold, <WG2400> a throne <WG2362> was set <WG2749> in heaven, <WG3772> and one sat <WG2521> on <WG1909> the throne. <WG2362>

And he that sat <WG2521> was to look <WG3706> on like <WG3664> a jasper <WG2393> and a sardine <WG4555> stone: <WG3037> and there was a rainbow <WG2463> round <WG2943> about <WG2943> the throne, <WG2362> in sight <WG3706> like <WG3664> to an emerald. <WG4664>

And round <WG2943> about <WG2943> the throne <WG2362> were four <WG5064> and twenty <WG1501> seats: <WG2362> and on the seats <WG2362> I saw <WG1492> four <WG5064> and twenty <WG1501> elders <WG4245> sitting, <WG2521> clothed <WG4016> in white <WG3022> raiment; <WG2440> and they had <WG2192> on <WG1909> their heads <WG2776> crowns <WG4735> of gold. <WG5552>

And out of the throne <WG2362> proceeded <WG1607> lightning <WG796> and thunder <WG1027> and voices: <WG5456> and there were seven <WG2033> lamps <WG2985> of fire <WG4442> burning <WG2545> before <WG1799> the throne, <WG2362> which <WG3739> are the seven <WG2033> Spirits <WG4151> of God. <WG2316>

And before <WG1799> the throne <WG2362> there was a sea <WG2281> of glass <WG5193> like <WG3664> to crystal: <WG2930> and in the middle <WG3319> of the throne, <WG2362> and round <WG2943> about <WG2943> the throne, <WG2362> were four <WG5064> beasts <WG2226> full <WG1073> of eyes <WG3788> before <WG1715> and behind. <WG3693>

And the first <WG4413> beast <WG2226> was like <WG3664> a lion, <WG3023> and the second <WG1208> beast <WG2226> like <WG3664> a calf, <WG3448> and the third <WG5154> beast <WG2226> had <WG2192> a face <WG4383> as a man, <WG444> and the fourth <WG5067> beast <WG2226> was like <WG3664> a flying <WG4072> eagle. <WG105>

And the four <WG5064> beasts <WG2226> had <WG2192> each <WG303> of them six <WG1803> wings <WG4420> about <WG2943> him; and they were full <WG1073> of eyes <WG3788> within: <WG2081> and they rest <WG2192> <WG372> not day <WG2250> and night, <WG3571> saying, <WG3004> Holy, <WG40> holy, <WG40> holy, <WG40> LORD <WG2962> God <WG2316> Almighty, <WG3841> which <WG3588> was, and is, and is to come. <WG2064>

And when <WG3752> those <WG3588> beasts <WG2226> give <WG1325> glory <WG1391> and honor <WG5092> and thanks <WG2169> to him that sat <WG2521> on <WG1909> the throne, <WG2362> who <WG3588> lives <WG2198> for ever <WG165> and ever, <WG165>

The four <WG5064> and twenty <WG1501> elders <WG4245> fall <WG4098> down before <WG1799> him that sat <WG2521> on <WG1909> the throne, <WG2362> and worship <WG4352> him that lives <WG2198> for ever <WG165> and ever, <WG165> and cast <WG906> their crowns <WG4735> before <WG1799> the throne, <WG2362> saying, <WG3004>

You are <WG1488> worthy, <WG514> O Lord, <WG2962> to receive <WG2983> glory <WG1391> and honor <WG5092> and power: <WG1411> for you have created <WG2936> all <WG3956> things, and for your pleasure <WG2307> they are and were created. <WG2936>
